abstract: Liverpool beats Sunderland, 1-0, in Premier League, maintaining their opportunity to qualify for Champions League play; other soccer scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Christian Benteke scored the winning goal as visiting Liverpool beat Sunderland, 1-0, in the Premier League to stay in the hunt for Champions League qualification.

headline.main: Liverpool Rises to 7th in Premier League

snippet: Christian Benteke scored the winning goal as visiting Liverpool beat Sunderland, 1-0, in the Premier League to stay in the hunt for Champions League qualification.
